scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.vercel-build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.fix-deps: cd client && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install && cd ../server && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install && cd .. && npm install
